Pemkot Boleh Paksa Pengusaha Gandeng Ormas?
04 Nov 2019, 10:48 by Anisa Indraini


Ilustrasi Ormas Kuasai Lahan Parkir Foto: Baban Gandapurnama

Jakarta - Belum lama ini beredar video ormas yang ingin menguasai lahan parkir di toko-toko waralaba di Bekasi. Bahkan infonya, perbuatannya dilegalkan oleh Pemkot Bekasi.Menanggapi itu, Direktur Riset Center of Reform on Economics (Core) Indonesia Pieter Abdullah mengatakan, tidak ada paksaan jika dunia usaha harus bekerja sama dengan ormas. Justru menurutnya, pemerintah yang harus bekerja sama dengan ormas."Tidak ada pemaksaan dunia usaha harus bekerja sama dengan ormas, tidak ada. Harusnya pemerintah memberdayakan ormas sesuai dengan jalurnya, bukan pemaksaan seperti itu," kata Pieter dia saat dihubungi detikcom, Senin (4/11/2019).Menurutnya, pemerintah pusat perlu mendalami hal ini. Apakah pengelolaan lahan parkir layak diserahkan ke sebuah ormas atau LSM. Mengingat kejadian itu dapat mengganggu kenyamanan, terutama bagi dunia usaha."Ini membuat tidak nyaman. Seandainya pemerintah melakukan kerjasama dengan ormas. Dikhawatirkan hukum rimba. Pemerintah pusat harus mendalami hal ini," ujarnya.Dalam video viral yang beredar, tampak Kepala Bapenda Kota Bekasi Aan Suhanda didampingi polisi dan sejumlah anggota ormas. Dalam video itu, Aan meminta agar minimarket di Kota Bekasi bekerja sama dengan ormas dalam hal penarikan retribusi parkir."Sekarang untuk pengelolaan tergantung pemilik Indomaret, Alfamart, saya harap ada kerja sama antara Alfamidi, Alfamart, Indomaret, bekerja sama apakah itu dengan ormas, saya harap ada kerja sama dengan ormas tinggal kita tanya sekarang, Indomaret sini bersedia atau tidak," tambah Aan. City Government May Forced Entrepreneurs Work Together with Community Organizations?
Nov 04 2019, 10:48 by Anisa Indraini


Illustration of Community Organizations Mastering Parking Land Photo: Baban Gandapurnama

Jakarta - Not long ago circulating video of organizations that want to control the parking lot in franchise shops in Bekasi. Even the info, his actions were legalized by Bekasi City Government. In response, Indonesian Center of Reform on Economics (Core) Research Director Pieter Abdullah said, there was no compulsion if the business world had to cooperate with mass organizations. In fact, according to him, the government must cooperate with CBOs. "There is no coercion of the business world must cooperate with CBOs, no. The government should empower CBOs according to its path, not coercion like that," Pieter said he when contacted by AFP on Monday (4) / 11/2019).According to him, the central government needs to explore this. Is the management of the parking lot appropriate to be submitted to a mass organization or NGO. "This makes it uncomfortable. If the government cooperates with CBOs. It is feared that the jungle law. The central government must explore this," he said. In the viral video circulating, the Head of Bapenda, Bekasi City Aan Suhanda was accompanied by the police and a number of community organization members. In the video, Aan requested that minimarket in Bekasi cooperate with mass organizations in collecting parking fees. "Now for management it depends on the owner of Indomaret, Alfamart, I hope there is cooperation between Alfamidi, Alfamart, Indomaret, working together whether it is with mass organizations, I hope there is cooperation with CSOs, we just ask now, here is Indomaret willing or not, "added Aan.
